channel.title: Npc Heads to big [PI]
channel.description:
Not sure if this is in the right place.
To start with, dont flame so many people have asked how to fix this, and yes this is client sided obviously. So, In your client class (client.java) search for: [code]RSInterface class9_4 = RSInterface.interfaceCache[l8];[/code]
Under the: [code]class9_4.disabledAnimation = i15;[/code]
Add: [code] if(i15 == 591 || i15 == 588) { class9_4.modelZoom = 1600; }[/code] This adjust the zoom of the head, down to the correct size.
Have any problems? add me, sambob95@live.co.uk Thanks Sam

item.title: Npc Heads to big [PI]
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

Not sure if this is in the right place.

To start with, dont flame so many people have asked how to fix this, and yes this is client sided obviously.
So, In your client class (client.java) search for: RSInterface class9_4 = RSInterface.interfaceCache[l8];

Under the: class9_4.disabledAnimation = i15;

Add: if(i15 == 591 || i15 == 588) { class9_4.modelZoom = 1600; }
This adjust the zoom of the head, down to the correct size.

Have any problems?
add me, sambob95@live.co.uk
Thanks Sam

Read full topic
